records.location_details: Interception of ten migrants who illegally crossed the land border from Belarus into Latvia, followed by their return to Belarus without individual assessment.

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of inhuman and degrading treatment
possible_violations.legal_basis: art. 4 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 19(1) of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 18 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 19 (2) of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights

records.context_note: Ten migrants were intercepted by a Frontex SCO and Latvian Border Guards after illegally crossing the border from Belarus to Latvia. They were provided with medical checks, food, and warm clothes, but subsequently returned to Belarus without an individual assessment of their situation, in application of a Cabinet of Ministers Order.
records.evidence_quote: On 24.02, ten migrants were returned to Belarus in application of paragraph no.4 from the Cabinet of Ministers Order No.518/10.08.2021
